I'm running a JUnit test via Ant's <junit> task. It completes with an
error=
, but I have yet to determine what the error is. I have tried
using the <re=
cord> Ant task with a debug loglevel to create a log
file, and I've tried u=
sing the <junitreport> task to create an HTML
report of the test run, neith=
er of which has resulted in anything
which gives me a clue as to what the e=
rror is. Can someone suggest
another approach?

Thanks in advance for any s=
uggestions.


--James
